56.eng-name: Fighting for the Cause of Allah (Jihaad)

hadiths.text: Narrated `Abdullah:When the Prophet (ﷺ) returned (from Jihad), he would say Takbir thrice and add, "We are returning, if Allah wishes, with repentance and worshipping and praising (our Lord) and prostrating ourselves before our Lord. Allah fulfilled His Promise and helped His Slave, and He Alone defeated the (infidel) clans

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يَقُولُ إِذَا رَجَعَ مِنَ الْغَزْوِ
chapter.eng-name: What to say on returning from Jihad
